missing_error_handling.pattern: API endpoints without comprehensive error handling
missing_error_handling.solution: Implement proper error boundaries, input validation, and graceful error responses

authentication_gaps.solution: Use bcrypt, implement rate limiting, secure JWT handling, OWASP compliance

dependency_hell.pattern: Version conflicts and dependency management issues
dependency_hell.solution: Use lock files, regular updates, dependency scanning, semantic versioning

frontend_backend_mismatch.pattern: Frontend and backend API contracts don't align
frontend_backend_mismatch.solution: Create OpenAPI specs, shared types, contract testing

database_schema_drift.pattern: Database schema and code models get out of sync
database_schema_drift.solution: Version-controlled migrations, schema validation, automated testing

non_atomic_requirements.pattern: PRD requirements with too many acceptance criteria
non_atomic_requirements.solution: Split into atomic requirements (max 3 ACs each), group by functional area
non_atomic_requirements.detection_rule: Count acceptance criteria - 4-6 ACs = warning, 7+ ACs = critical split required

oversized_tasks.pattern: Tasks too large for individual agents to complete
oversized_tasks.solution: Use multi-level decomposition (X.0 → X.1 → X.1.1), split by component or file

atomicity_rules.success_criteria: Exactly 1 clear, testable criterion per task

vague_task_descriptions.pattern: Task descriptions with multiple 'and' or vague scope
vague_task_descriptions.solution: Be specific - one task per file or component, use imperative verbs (Create, Implement, Add, Test)
